Package com.pgs.service

Class ComunServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.pgs.service.ComunServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IComunService
@Service public class ComunServiceImpl extends Object implements IComunService
Implementation of the IComunService interface that provides common utility methods for handling HTTP responses. This service is used to simplify the creation of standardized responses with a message.
Author:
Pablo Garcia Simavilla

  • Method Details

    • getResponseEntity

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getResponseEntity(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus, String mensaje)
      Creates a ResponseEntity with the specified HTTP status and message. This method is commonly used for returning consistent responses in the application.
      Specified by:
      getResponseEntity in interface IComunService
      Parameters:
      httpStatus - The HTTP status code to be returned in the response.
      mensaje - The message to be included in the response body.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a HashMap with the message.
